lessons.title: Lesson 3: Everyday Conversations
sentences: Can you help me with this?
I need to improve my pronunciation.
What do you do for a living?

lessons.title: Lesson 4: Grammar Essentials
sentences: Grammar is the foundation of language.
Nouns, verbs, and adjectives are essential.

lessons.title: Lesson 5: Talking About Hobbies
sentences: How do you spend your free time?

lessons.title: Lesson 6: Shopping and Dining
sentences: I would like to order a coffee.
Do you have this in a different size?
Can I have the bill, please?

lessons.title: Lesson 7: Travel and Directions
sentences: Where is the nearest bus stop?
How do I get to the airport?
I would like to book a hotel room.
What time does the train leave?

lessons.title: Lesson 9: Work and Careers
sentences: What do you do for work?
I have a meeting at 10 AM.
Let's discuss this in the office.

lessons.title: Lesson 10: Future Plans
sentences: What are your plans for the weekend?
I am going to visit my family.
Do you want to travel abroad?
I hope to learn a new language.
Let's make a plan for next month.

lessons.title: Lesson 11: Family and Relationships
sentences: How many people are in your family?
I have two brothers and one sister.
We spend a lot of time together.
Family is very important to me.

lessons.title: Lesson 12: Weather and Seasons
sentences: Let's go to the beach this summer.

sentences: I use my laptop for work.

sentences: I go to the gym every day.

lessons.title: Lesson 16: Music and Entertainment
sentences: What kind of music do you like?

lessons.title: Lesson 18: Education and Learning
sentences: What did you study in school?
I am learning a new language.
Education is the key to success.

lessons.title: Lesson 19: Time Management
sentences: How do you manage your time?

Let's set some goals for this week.

sentences: Art is a form of expression.

sentences: What do you know about history?

sentences: I am fascinated by space exploration.

lessons.title: Lesson 25: Business and Entrepreneurship
sentences: I want to start my own company.

sentences: I try to avoid junk food.

sentences: I am interested in artificial intelligence.

sentences: Personal development is a lifelong journey.

lessons.title: Lesson 30: Environmental Sustainability
sentences: I use reusable bags for shopping.

lessons.title: Lesson 31: Social Etiquette
sentences: Do you know proper social etiquette?

sentences: Business strategies are essential for success.

sentences: What lessons can we learn from history?
